snippet: Progress during the papal conclave will be measured in the colors of the smoke that will emerge after the voting, but just how those colors are made remains a mystery.
abstract: Colors of smoke that emerge from Sistine Chapel will show progress being made during papal conclave, but how those colors are created remains mystery.

byline.contributor: Daniel J. Wakin contributed reporting from Vatican City.

lead_paragraph: Progress during the papal conclave will be measured in the colors of the smoke that will emerge after the voting, but just how those colors are made remains a mystery.

headline.seo: Recipe for Conclave’s Black and White Smoke Remains a Mystery
headline.main: Conclave Smoke’s Recipe Is a Mystery
headline.print_headline: Conclave Smoke’s Recipe Is a Mystery
